# ipv4_long2ip (Function)

Convert an IPv4 address from its 32-bit integer representation to dotted-decimal string form.

## Example Usage

```terraform
output "ip" {
  value = provider::zeus::ipv4_long2ip(3232235777)
}
```

## Signature

```text
ipv4_long2ip(ipv4_long int) string
```
